actions-list.header: United States Group of the NATO Parliamentary Assembly
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to 22 U.S.C. 1928a, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the United States Group of the NATO Parliamentary Assembly: Mr. Connolly, Ms. Sanchez, Mr. Larsen of Washington and Mr. Boyle of Pennsylvania.

Pursuant to section 2 of the Migratory Bird Conservation Act (16 U.S.C. 715a), and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following member of the House to the Migratory Bird Conservation Commission: Mr. Thompson of California.

actions-list.header: Commission on Security and Cooperation in Europe
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to 22 U.S.C 3003, and the order of the House of January 9, 2023, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Commission on Security and Cooperation in Europe: Mr. Cohen, Mr. Cleaver and Mr. Veasey.
The House proceeded with one minute speeches.
The Chair designated Ms. Salinas to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.

The Chair announced that he had examined the Journal of the last day's proceedings and had approved it. Mr. Wilson (SC) demanded that the question be put on agreeing to the Speaker's approval of the Journal and by voice vote, the Chair announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Wilson (SC) objected to the voice vote based upon the absence of a quorum and the Chair postponed further proceedings on the question of agreeing to the Speaker's approval of the Journal until a time to be announced.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
